website_summaries.verdict: Skinerals provides not only instant but long-lasting results. The company's efforts to use natural ingredients will have you feeling as good as you look.
pros: The Skinerals mousse looks very natural
We also love how it leaves the skin feeling soft and hydrated
This company puts an emphasis on skin health, using natural and organic ingredients wherever possible
We also like knowing that a portion of the sales are donated to skin cancer research
cons: If you have any areas you need to buff out, do it fast

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! First pic is only one leg done after 10 min second pic is both legs at 30 min and last pic both legs at 1 hour! Pleasant smell super easy application (I did purchase and use the mit) researched many brands for many months before deciding since this is my first self tanning attempt. Also I have super sensitive skin associated with an immune disorder and I have no irritation what so ever from the product! Highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kelch

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Even works on old lady skin!
customer_reviews.text: I will be 62 in April so I have that old lady skin. I try to protect my skin from this Florida sun. I have tried many sunless tanners and this is the absolute best! Due to my fear of turning orange (as with other tanners) I put it on lightly and went about my business. I walked by a mirror and gasp! I'm brown! So excited! My neighbor asked if I had been to the beach! Best tanner ever!
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. March

customer_reviews.title: Irritated skin. Red rash.
customer_reviews.text: I dont know how this is almost a 5 star! That is why I ordered it. With almost 5 stars and over 1k reviews, I thought it would be amazing. This is the worst tanner I've ever used. I turned so red right as i applied this stuff. I'm not sensitive to much.. I've never turned red with any other self tanner. This is the first time. After turning red, and skin irritated, I washed it off. I then read the bad reviews and saw that others experienced the same issue. I also read others saying this isn't even organic at all and has harmful ingredients. =( definitely returning!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skinerals self tanner is a must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I am someone who makes sure my tan is consistent throughout everyday and have tried products after products over the past 6+ years! This brand is not only organic which is what caught my eye, but the color itself and how it applies to the skin is more than I could have asked for!!! Love love love it and will stick to this from here in out! Definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: andrea barnes

customer_reviews.title: Ghost white to natural bronze - amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was born in Ireland. I am naturally GHOST white. My body does not tan, no matter how hard I try I either stay white or get burnt. This product was the first time o ever saw myself with a tan complexion and I LOVED IT. It looked natural, it spread evenly and it made my muscles look so much more defined. Will be continuing to use this product in the future!
customer_reviews.author: HR

customer_reviews.title: I really like this!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this! I was looking to replace my expensive St Tropez Bronzing Mousse and came across this item while searching and thought I'd give it a try. You need to use a mitt to apply. Gave a really nice bronze color, no streaking, no real noticeable smell. I love that this is a natural product.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Mccullcoh

customer_reviews.title: Not all it’s cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: I was in hopes this self tanner would be a good one but I’m not that happy with it. It does have an odor. And it’s got some orange tint to it. Don’t even think of putting it anywhere near an elbow, knee, ankle or foot. And I did it very sparingly and after exfoliating and thoroughly moisturizing as it advised. The tanner does stay on for the 5-7 days and it does fade evenly which are both good things. Definitely invest the $6 and get an application mit. The mit definitely helps it go on more evenly. I’m going to use this bottle up but will try something different next time.
customer_reviews.author: HarleyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. It has the usual drawbacks of the "tanner" smell after it starts to develop and you can definitely get streaks or spots if you don't take your time to apply it properly. Otherwise, it's awesome. The color is the most realistic I've seen out of any product I've used, it dries quickly and doesn't come off on your clothes or sheets, and it really does last for 5-7 days. I applied it on a Friday and didn't have to reapply until the following Thursday. For the most part it faded evenly, though a few spots on my legs faded faster than others.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina T.

customer_reviews.title: I am surprised this product has so many excellent reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using sunless tanners for years and have seen how far they have come. I was expecting something special about this and there was nothing special about it. The scent.. yes.. though not instantly.. will smell like all the sunless tanners. Needing a mitt? Inconvenient. I used rubber gloves or bare hands and just had to wash 2-3 times to get from staining my hands. What I really disliked.. was in the shower even 12 -14 hours later..... you see more of the color go down the drain than the color on your body. It is more like a body make up than a good sunless tanner.
customer_reviews.author: Travelin Val

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy!
customer_reviews.text: I have used MANY self tanning products and this is hands down the worst! I cannot believe the good reviews. I have a strict method that works great...moisturizer on the elbows, knees and ankles, and then apply the product. First, my hands were dyed brown/orange. There wasnt any moisture feeling while trying to spread the...bubbly content. The dye went right into my leg pores...who knew I head leg pores?!? There were other issues around my chest but ... So, needless to say, I'm super unhappy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bronze color - no orange at all
customer_reviews.text: I applied the tanning mousse last night around 5 pm. Honestly, I wasn’t too impressed right away and thought I would need to reapply today. Well I woke up and it is a pretty golden tan. It Developed overnight much darker! As I was applying it it had a bit of a greenish tint also. So don’t let that throw you. Also I wasn’t sure if I would like the mousse formula but I actually did. It dries quick and is easy to apply. I did use a mitt I already had to apply it. I applied it to my face with my fingers. I am extremely fair skinned and have tried countless self tanners. This is definitely a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like this product for a couple reasons. It provides a pretty much instant tan. Doesn't look orange, and is decently long lasting (5-7 days). It dries pretty quickly and doesn't get on your clothes one dry. The smell isn't amazing, but it isn't terrible. With that being said, applications does take a little practice. Since it dries quickly you have to move quickly to avoid streaking. You also need to make sure you moisturize daily or it starts looking a little weird. Overall, I really like this product and will continue to use it. It does provide a nice looking tan.
customer_reviews.author: lcp

customer_reviews.title: Use a brush to blend and you are set
customer_reviews.text: Got this for vacation bc I don’t like to tan naturally and I’m sick of being the palest person on the beach. I haven’t even left yet and I’m getting so many compliments on the color. I’m extremely fair skinned and the tan was nice and deep. I re-applied after about 5-6 days to make sure it didn’t look patchy. It even lasted through a few soaks in the tub. Will update after upcoming vaca.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, great smell
customer_reviews.text: I started using self tanners after I had an allergic reaction to tanning beds. This product was recommended by a friend and I love it. Easy to apply, may need a couple coats for even coverage. Smells like coffee, so a plus there. I'm fair skinned and want a natural tone, so 2 coats does the trick for me. As with all the others wash hans immediately after applying and stay away from knees, elbows and heels.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Made multiple attempts with this using different items to wipe on. Cloths just absorb it. Used hands to spread it and did show some darkness after it dried. It does leave streaks however. Wanted something that was easy and reliable since everyone in my family has had skin cancer at some point. Probably won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kyle wilson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Product
customer_reviews.text: Ok---I love the subtle smell, the natural glow, and how quickly the tan develops. That being said; I don't like how fragile it is. Within an hour of applying it, I accidently dripped some water on my leg. There were white blotches where the water fell. After 24 hours, I took a bath. I very gently cleaned my skin with a cloth but by the end of it, my bath water was orange and I lost a lot of my tan. I plan on running around on a sandy beach--so we'll see how well this product holds up. Overall, I'm pleased with this product and it tops everything else I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: MorJoy

customer_reviews.title: Smells like cinnamon rolls!
customer_reviews.text: I have used other self-tanner creams, but I'm going to stick with Skinerals. While there is a "lotion-y" feel that remains somewhat until you shower it off 8 or so hours later, it is much more subtle and comfortable than the heavy, greasy feel of some other self-tanners. Also, I am quite sensitive to perfume-like smells, but this one didn't bother me. I woke up with the sensation, "What is that smell?" and my first thought was, "Cinnamon rolls". But nope - it was the Skinerals self-tanner I'd applied the night before. I apply the Skinerals self-tanner, to my head and neck and face, with disposable medical gloves, which gives me more flexibility in application around my eyes and ears.
customer_reviews.author: Shellee

customer_reviews.title: Easy, smells good, natural looking tan that lasts.
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this product; tan looks natural and you get a good color almost instantly, and it didn't make my joints super orange, so that's a plus. Doesn't smell as chemically as some other products either, actually smells kind of nice. So far I'm 3 days in and still have a nice glow. The only caution I would give is to make sure you blend it well because it'll leave a line of demarcation if you're not careful. Shave and exfoliate before, you'll be thankful.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Whitman

customer_reviews.title: The. Best. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried SO MANY tanning products. I am quite pale and my legs just don't tan. I wound up looking "patchwork" because my arms tan, but my legs don't. I LOVE THIS PRODUCT. Exfoliate, use the mit and it WORKS. I applied it 2 days in a row to get the color i wanted. Looked totally natural. I used to go to a "spray tan" place and get sprayed.....now that i have this product I think I can keep good color on my legs for the summer - dresses, shorts - no problem. LOVE IT!!!! And it doesn't smell funky at all.
customer_reviews.author: rdgmachine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and good color
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for the first time tonight on my legs. I went ahead and applied it with a plastic glove on. So far it has a great color, no smell- or I can’t smell anything. I don’t know about moisturizing yet. Usually moisturizing comes from more of a lotion application, and this is a mousse. I squirt it three times per leg and it covered the whole leg. I like that this product seems more natural and is very light weight on the skin. So far my legs are tan. I’ll bet they are tanner tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: EMB

customer_reviews.title: Works, no Orange
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. I purchased this for my son's wedding. I'm on anticoagulant Wanted to cover up guide's and little red spots. When I told my future now actual daughter-in-law. Her response was Don't you will be orange. Tried it on a large spot on my thigh, before committing to put on arms and legs.. Worked great no orange, covered the evidence of blood thinners. Of course no one cares what I looked like the bride was beautiful. Definitely would recommend. I only write reviews when a product is really good or very bad
customer_reviews.author: Cherl Christensen

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for any self tanner
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best tanner I have ever used! I consider myself an frequent spray tanner. I go about once every 2-3 weeks. I usually pay the $25-$40 for a professional job but that can get really pricy. So I turned to self tanning options. I’ve tried a lot of different self tanners with no luck. Until this! Drys quick and long lasting without the streaks. I bought a application mitt and it works great with this product. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Rojek

customer_reviews.title: Magical Miracle Tanning Solution
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever say this about beauty products but... Wow. This stuff is legit. I am allergic to traditional self tanning products so took a leap of faith and bought this one... It works like magic. I went from being pale to bronze and gorgeous all in one application. No allergic reactions, no sticky lotion feel. Yes, you need to use a towel or Mitt to apply the stuff or you will stain your hands. I am no longer embarrassed to show my skin for the summer! Thank you Skinerals.
customer_reviews.author: SB Roozenboom, Author

customer_reviews.title: This product gave a great color and coverage but the next day it simply ...
customer_reviews.text: This product gave a great color and coverage but the next day it simply came off of the back of my legs and left spots on my arms. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Colo sprgs

customer_reviews.title: BEST SELF TANNER/BRONZER - I’m in love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 80 stars if I could!!! Incredibly easy and fast to apply because it’s a light fluffy foam and you can instantly see the coverage results. I LOVE the super natural color and it doesn’t leave a smell. As a fair skinned female I have tried tons of self-tanners and there is no comparison between the others I have tried and this one - and I’m extremely picky.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color of this product. Definitely one of the better ones I’ve tried (and I’ve tried well over 50 products). Here’s my Pros: Easy application Even color Good price point Good smell Developes well Cons Comes off easily (when you’re trying to dry) especially around the wrists. Might want to be careful after application. Overall, I think the problems with this product come standard with any tanning product, but the benefits are above avaerage. Will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Have to be particular when applying.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Gives a beautiful tan and is the perfect color for even fair skinned ladies (the californium color) Didn’t turn me orange. BUT be sure to use a kabuki brush for elbows, feet, hands, etc. Cons: Don’t recommend for face. Leaves streaks on face for some reason. (I use golden star beauty face tan oil for my face and neck and blend down into chest area) When fading, it makes the most horrible splotching Also, when you later, you have to be super careful or else you will have dark patches for some reason. No matter if I applied with mitt OR gloves or hands it did the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D Morris

customer_reviews.title: Dries fast and even tan!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tanner I’ve tried so far. Dries very fast and does not have that lingering sticky feeling or like you have too much on. A little bit washes off in the shower which is good because it evens it out and blends. I highly recommend buying the mitt with this product! Do not use your hands! I tried to use other things and it just doesn’t apply it as evenly.
customer_reviews.author: S. G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect foam tanner
customer_reviews.text: I love this self tanner. I love the fact that it’s foam so it spreads evenly. **MAKE SURE to moisturize before applying! Very important to avoid dry patches/splotchiness.** *It does go on with a greenish tint, but once the color sets, it’s the perfect tan color without any orange-y-ness. After a few hours it does have a spray tan smell, but it’s not unbearable by any means. One bottle seems to last forever. I reapply 1-2 times per week depending on my weekly activities (every 3 days or so on my face) and I’m going on 9 weeks since I bought the product and still have some left!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Bronzer
customer_reviews.text: So this is a bronzer that will stain your hands/whatever surface it touches, but will also very quickly give you a nice natural looking tan. No orange skin or funky colors. My days of tanning/getting sun are out to take care of my skin, but I do prefer my legs to be tan. I use this mostly on my body, not my face, and it lasts about 2 weeks and I've been able to reapply a few times on the same bottle. Be careful, it will stain white sheets, white pants, white towels, so make sure to exfoliate first and often to keep the color on you and off your stuff.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Sad Tan
customer_reviews.text: My first bottle was amazing. People complimented me on my tan constantly. I sent the product link to everyone who was shocked my tan came from a bottle. I even bought the mitts and lotion extender. BUT the second bottle is awful. It’s leaving blotches and won’t tan my inner arms, it’s crazy. Disappointed because I thought I was onto a great tan without damaging my skin. Now I have to wear pants. Blotchy on the face and neck is the worst!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product!
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd or 4 th bottle of this product but this past bottle is NOT the same. It doesn’t last and is orangey and streaky. The last couple bottle I received it cam in 2 bottle for you to pour the product in the pump bottle this one did not. NOT HAPPY with this purchase and will not order again, time to find another brand!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicci

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to disperse, spread and use. I recommend using a tanning mitt to apply as you can see automatically where your applying it, so your tan is instant but it gets darker the longer you leave it on. I apply it at night and first thing in the morning. It’s not a dark tan but it does give a nice glow. There is a nice scent which isn't overpowering but pleasant. It doesn't dry out your skin. Feels smooth and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Stull

customer_reviews.title: I’m a fan
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and quick to tan, not a huge fan of the smell and I do find that I need to apply body oil on about 10 minutes after drying to give my skin a little hydration boost, but the product lasts for 5-7 days, does NOT give the horrible orange glow that some others do, and doesn’t stain clothing or sheets. Best sunless tanner I have found so far, but could still make some small improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Blackstone

customer_reviews.title: works great and no orange tone at all.  Will bring out skin flaws, but so will the sun....
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well with my very white skin! I have never had a decent tan in my life, so after 40 something years I've decided to give it up. This product looks like a real tan and I get compliments from coworkers too. The only negative if any is that it brings out your age spots and highlights them, as well as the sun that created them to begin with. I feel like a new person and have bought a second bottle as of today. Also I didn't use a mit. Instead I used a stain applicator pad from lowes, and it works quite well....
customer_reviews.author: J. Kriezel

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunless Tanner Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Usually don't write reviews, but this product deserves a good one. I have tried many self-tanners but keep looking for that perfect one and this is it! Never used a foam before and at first I didn't like it. However, I did buy a mitt and after getting the hang of it, will never go back! This bronzer has nothing but good things about it: Dries IMMEDIATELY No offensive odor No streaks! It may not last as long as they say, probably only 3-4 days, however, you get so much for your money and it is so easy to apply, it is not a big deal. Only recommend you shower before you apply moisture lotion after first application.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasts about 2 Days
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, goes on well. I found if I followed the instructions first (exfoliate, put lotion on your elbows, knees, etc) that it does not leave streaks. The problem that I can is that after two days, I need to re-apply. And guess what? I don't want to spend that much time tanning when there are other options out there that last longer. So I changed brands and am happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda  Blue

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this product because I have light skin and it is made out of organic materials and I'm sensitive to other tan lotions. I put it on exactly according to the directions with a tanning mitt and about an hour later went to bed. It is very dry and hard to spread evenly but the smell is not too bad. I woke up and was horribly blotchy so I took a shower After the shower I was still a mess Plus is irritated my skin and it is itchy. I would absolutely never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's really great
customer_reviews.text: Hey, I'm an esthetician and I really care about ingredients. I love the ingredients in this product. I was using a sub-par organic product from Alba for years because I did not want to use a "good" brand with bad ingredients. So, I tried this brand and I am beyond impressed. The foam is easy to handle and smells great. The other product I used was a cream and it was orangey. This produces a beautiful bronze brown. The product will stain your hands so it's best to get the mitt as well :) Happy bronzing
customer_reviews.author: Mariposa

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a first timer!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first at home, self tanner and it was easy to use. There is a scent but it is soft and not overwhelming. The application was easy and I felt I had a chance to fix any mistakes on my end. Color: I went from very pale to. Healthy looking glow and didn’t come out orange. This looked very natural. I did use a makeup brush to blend this up my neck, and on to my feet and hands. I’ll buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skinerals Self Tanner
customer_reviews.text: I finally got a chance to try out this product. It is honestly the best self tanner that I have ever used. It goes on easily with no streaks and doesn't feel sticky. I love that it is chemical free. I will be repurchasing this product for sure! I’m a little frustrated with this company as they stated you would receive a free product after writing a review which I did, and never received the free product. It’s a good tanner but the company did not hold true to the promotion they offered even after I filled out the questionnaire
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The initial smell of the tanner is awesome. Smells like green apple! But the after smell is not pleasant and it lasts a few showers. As for the color, I feel it’s a little on the orange side. But that may be because I’m very pale. ***Update: I’ve been using this for about s month now and I do not like it at all. The application is so uneven and I’ve never had that happen before. I do exfoliate and moisturize very well beforehand, yet it’s like it only sticks to my skin in certain areas.
customer_reviews.author: Haley C.

customer_reviews.title: I love this tanner!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! So please give yourself a chance to try it out , I am positive you won't regret it! I am glad I decided to try this amazing product ! It doesn't smell like others sunless bronzes in the market , it has a nice botanical smell. The color is beautiful and natural, it lasts for over a week! It is easy to apply with the tanning exfoliator mitt , so please make sure you buy both products. It is organic, chemical free, provides instant and long lasting bronzing! This is what you are looking for! Thank you Skinerals for providing safe and effective solutions!
customer_reviews.author: J.B

customer_reviews.title: Not good tanning at all
customer_reviews.text: Blotchy, uneven, very light and don't give my skin that glowing healthy appearance like the Fake Bake 60 min I used before. I bought this one because Fake Bake raised prices for their product from $13 to $24 and I decided to explore other products trying to find a better one. This had so many raving reviews, which I now understand are probably fake. There's no way anyone can be happy with the quality of tan this lotion provides. I am an experienced self-tanner, I exfoliate, use professional mitt and follow the instructions , so it's no like it was my first time tanning.
customer_reviews.author: M.Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Gives a nice looking tan, but don't sleep in it before rinsing off!
customer_reviews.text: I applied this the night before attending a wedding. It was easy to apply and went on pretty evenly. I let it fully dry and then went to bed a few hours later. I woke up to orange sheets! I washed them and there wasn't any staining, so that's good. I just wasn't expecting so much color to come off on my sheets, as that doesn't normally happen whenI get a spray tan. My tan looked really nice and natural though!
customer_reviews.author: C. Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I am writing a true review based on what I really think about is it is not all that special it's a normal Tanner it's pretty nice because it takes about three washes before it actually comes off but I don't know if it's worth $20 because it does come off it's doesn't last too long. A lot of these reviews are fake because of the fact that they do give you a free bottle for a good review that's what they say but they never really send you one at least they'd never sent it to me
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Great for my fair skin
customer_reviews.text: I used to love and use Tanwise dark foaming mousse, but the formulation changed recently and is awful. This is an AWESOME substitute. The color is very natural and goes on well with a mitt. I shave and exfoliate, put lotion on feet and knees, and then apply this. I probably use 4-5 squirts per full leg. I apply this about twice a week. I love that there is an instant bronzing effect. After about 12 hours I can shower and he bronzer wears off, but a beautiful natural color is left behind. I have fair red-headed skin and have tried numerous sunless tanners, so take it from me- this is one of the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amy E Williams

customer_reviews.title: Uneven fade
customer_reviews.text: Updated: after using this for a while I can say I’m not the biggest fan, it doesn’t go on as evenly as other foams I have used. . .but mainly the problem is it comes off really uneven so I look splotchy. I don’t have this problem with my usual self tanner and do everything the same I do like that it has healthier ingredients so it was ok to use during pregnancy but I won’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Connor McKay

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Im a male using product, for me after exfoliating and keeping body hair trimmed, it does a pretty good job, just make sure you don't leave blotches or else it will stay more dark in that spot, it does have a tanning lotion smell to it and smell will be on your clothes, but after first shower after application, smell lightens mostly, Tan looks great and lasts for me about 6 days!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: No orange color at all
customer_reviews.text: Really love this product! No orange color at all. First application I out of the bottle it looked like mud, but the resulting color looks so authentic. I literally get compliments on my “tan” from people. It’s better after you’ve worn it for many hours & then showered off the excess! Won’t ever buy another brand! On my second bottle and have recommended it to friends. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Boomer's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Clogged leg pores and expires in 4months
customer_reviews.text: This clogged my pores too much and gave me a dotty look. I tried all kinds of things, figuring this was just an issue with my own skin but other products don’t do this to me. I also wish I would have known it would expire in 4 months. I don’t use the product consistently enough to finish it that soon. It turned green like the bottle states. So I didn’t even get to finish it. Disappointed overall.
customer_reviews.author: JMckee

customer_reviews.title: Best Self Tanner Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because tanning products usually are prone to promise big but give dismal results. I decided to try this because of the organic ingredients but, most of all, the reviews given. My first bottle came and it has more than exceeded my expectations!! This goes on so lightly and the results are amazing! The tan looks so natural. I've received compliments from so many "Where did you get that tan this time of year?" I also bought the back applicator and the mitt--best ever. I was using products from Ulta and paying double the price--no more! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Pat M

customer_reviews.title: More brown than Orange.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually fake bake. But I was feeling extra white this winter so I thought I would try this guy. I bought it based on the reviews. I’ve tried a couple of other self tanners before and haven’t been super impressed. I feel like they’re all too orange. I REALLY like this one though. It is a little orange but I feel like it’s more tan. I actually use a mitt from another self tanner that I have, to apply this one and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: Skinerals is not the worst tanner, but it's not the best. The tan goes on a small shade of green/gray, so you're not really able to run errands if you put the tanner on in the morning. Once it's been on for the 8 hours and you wash it off, the tan is very nice. After a couple of days when the tan is fading, it fades in sections/spots which was a little frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Do a practice application the first time.
customer_reviews.text: My first time using this I exfoliated and shaved the night before per the instructions. I applied this using a hand mitten and the results were streaky and splotchy. I intend to apply again after using some type of moisturizer. I am older and have drier skin. The smell was pleasant. Also if you have age spots or raised moles, be sure to lightly wipe these with a damp washcloth immediately after using. I hope to perfect this. A younger friend uses this product and it always looks great on her!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: So I have always used another organic sunless tanner and was very hesitant to try a new one. I absolutely love this product. More than I did the old I used to use. This one goes on well. It doesn’t streak. It layers well. It even wears off very well. It doesn’t get splotchy or weird. It lasts very well as well. I shave my whole body literally every single day and even with that constant exfoliation it wears off and lasts amazinlingly. I have def found a new favorite! Will be buying again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Astorga

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: This works okay... I've used similar products that range from high end to lower end then this. This one has okay color... not my fave, or leans a little orange side. Tends to be a little streaky compared to others, and it doesn't smell good. I will not purchase again. If you're in a bind, it'll do. But it teaters on the edge of not being worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, looks natural
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of Skinerals self tanner. I use it when I need a little extra color on my legs in the winter and spring. I highly recommend buying the mitts to use with the product. Just a Couple little squirts of the mousse on the mitt covers one leg and it easily glides over your skin to help with coverage. I then use a blow dryer to dry my legs and I can immediately put on my clothes and get on with my day.
customer_reviews.author: RDSunset

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: Yessss!!! Finally a really great self-tanner! This works like a dream. The color is perfect (not orange or black-tinted) and makes a perfect golden tan. It smells great too! It does transfer to my clothes after the gym or any time I sweat a lot. But I have tried a lot of self-tanners and this has been my favorite so far. I actually reordered twice!
customer_reviews.author: CR_RN1977

customer_reviews.title: Works great minimal scent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this along with the glove and only use once-twice a week. It goes on very evenly. The scent is minimal. I purchased this in the spring and its now fall and I still have plenty left. Note: I only use this on my legs/feet. If its still works next spring I'll use what's left. If not I will buy this again. CON: The top portion can leak slightly so I cover it with a piece of paper towel when I shake it.
customer_reviews.author: Nekoatl

customer_reviews.title: Get this
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tanner. I've been looking a trying a couple different kinds and this one is the best I've used! Although, I didn't know that I needed to wash it off after 8-12 hrs for the final look. I was a little worried I looked orangey, but after a quick shower my legs were beautifully tanned. I put it on on 7/18 and just did another coat today on 7/22. Its lasted pretty great even after 3 showers and shaving of the legs. I had to do a touch up the day after I first put it on but I think I went overboard on the moisturizer beforehand so it didn't take so well. 100% would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Instant Tan like you've been on vacation for a week!
customer_reviews.text: I am from Chicago and everyone at this time of year looks like ghosts. I have tried other products and never seen such an instant great tan! I did take a chance on ordering this product and have fallen in love. I was amazed how well and even this product came out on my skin just after first application. I purchased the mitts to exfoliate and then used soft mitts to apply tanner. Love them! I would recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this product at first and loved the color it gave me since it looked natural with no orange tint to it, but unfortunately, it caused a couple pimples to surface on my face and butt. The color is also fading after 3 days, so for the price, it's not worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Good but....
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have with this product is that if left to set too long or applying too much by accident, this is ORANGE! (I’m also very pale, soooo 😂) but overall with trial and error, I’ve learned the perfect pump sizes for each body part as well as how long I should let them develop for each body part before rinsing. I apply this a tanner mitt and it applies smooth and leaves a tint behind so you can see where you’ve applied previously.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great, Natural Tan with Skinerals!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many self tanners in the past, and this is so far the best of all. It goes on very smooth, dries quickly, the scent is not as strong as others, and it gives a very natural brown color, and with all good ingredients. To get the best results, you must also get Skinerals Mitt. It makes a big difference. I am very happy with Skinerals Self Tanning Foam and look forward in trying out their skincare products next..
customer_reviews.author: sweetie

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST self tanner I have ever used! Makes you look like you got a subtle tan with zero orangeness. I’m a very pale person and this has been such a great product to make it look like I’ve been outside all summer. Will be buying more bottles when needed! It also lasts for quite a while after application, like a week+
customer_reviews.author: Z. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Mild scent, great color!
customer_reviews.text: Super pleased with this product! I'm a pale, with peach and olive undertones so I find it difficult to find a product that is build-able, but will give me immediate color. This stuff is IT! Easy to apply (I did purchase their mit). Middle-back is always tough but I managed. They have an instructions website which I found helpful too! I purchased the "Original" color and I love it. I haven't worn it a full couple of days yet, but it seems to be lasting alright.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lee

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: Let me preface this by saying I have NEVER used a self tanner before but this is amazing! I tan easily during the summer, but I am ghostly white after the winter. This is so easy to apply (with the glove) and not streaky. The color is just enough and totally natural looking- not orange at all. It gives you a healthy bronze glow. Friends have randomly complimented me without knowing. And it smells fine- almost like a sunscreen. Color lasts about 3 days. I will not be self conscious to wear shorts this spring. Definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get it, waste of money, and will leave you with streaks.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I’m disappointed with this product. You need to apply it evenly as soon as it touches your skin or you will have streaks & it will be uneven. If you don’t use any gloves for the application of it then your hands will turn orange. It offers no moisturizing properties, leaves my skin dry & itchy. I’m embarrassed by how this product looks when applied bc it looks terrible & fake. From afar it looks like a good tan but up close it looks like a preschool finger paint project. I would suggest looking for another self Tanning product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Koster

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This is so Bad, I have no clue why someone would have a positive experience w/ this. It’s so splotchy. I used a tanning mitten and it didn’t help. Nothing natural about it. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Best self-tanner available!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been experimenting with different self tanners in preparation for my wedding. I’ve gotten a professional, by hand spray tan, tried a few lotions and then found this foam based on the reviews on amazon. It exceeded my expectations and looked better and more even than the professionally sprayed tan did! I have had multiple compliments on how good it looks and have had multiple people ask what I use so they can try it too. Make sure to buy the applicator mitt! This made putting it on evenly SO much easier! I will never use a different brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Allison KBS

customer_reviews.title: Shower 12 hrs after and it’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sunless tanner out there. I applied with a microfiber nut the first time I used it, and just used my bare hands every time after. I’ve used it on my legs four times now and it’s not even half gone. I only notice a slight sunless tanner smell about 18 hours after application, but it goes away (the smell not the color!) after a shower. I would recommend using this the night before your event so you have a chance to let the color fully develop, and you can shower once just to make sure there isn’t an odor. Absolutely love this better for you option for sun kissed skin!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fake tan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great self tanner to use IF you do it correctly! Vaseline on all rough places!! Im not joking because the color will stick! This means feet, ankles, toes, wrists, knuckles, knees, and elbows. Exfoliating, shaving, and Moisturizing your whole body before is even better. Purchasing the mit makes it 10 times easier and it makes a even distribution of product. After putting it on wait 24 hours to wash off. Very little product came off for me and I’m on day 3 with a very nice tan.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanning product I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a multitude of self tanning products over the years and this is the best by far. Easy to put on if you are careful and use a mitt. I mainly apply it to my legs because I wear suit skirts and dresses to work and gave up pantyhose years ago. Lots of people have made positive comments on my tan and have been really surprised to find out it comes from a bottle. A great selling point is that it doesn’t have that yucky fake tan smell that most products do. I also follow the manufacturers suggestions and store it in my refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Stella J

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking to self-tan, buy this...seriously
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best self-tanner I think I’ve ever used tbh. I’m like naturally super pale and after one use it made me look healthy and glowy (not orange tinted or anything). It looks natural, blends well while applying so there’s not really streak marks, and it smells amazing!! 😍 literally my fave after using it for a month!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: By far hands down the best I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: Obviously you need to have a slight base tan with this one bc it makes you bronze. I’ve used tan physics which was ok not dark as I preferred, James reed sleep mask tan face is great, st tropes was definitely my number one before this one. They both go on smooth not splotchy and can use on face but this one has no scent and is more bronze so def number 1
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Favorite ever!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite sunless tanner ever! I've used many brands in the past, and had been using the fake bake spray for the last few years. It works great, but was messy and not as natural as I wanted it to be. Found this and although I'm always skeptical when trying a new tanner, I was thoroughly impressed. Not only does it go on easily (with a mitt, not included), but it has a pleasant smell as well--kind of like apples when going on. It's dark enough with just one application, and lasts about a week. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Comes off
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, smell and that it’s healthier (better for you), however, I feel like it doesn’t stay on. I apply after I shower. The next time I shower (even after 24/48 hrs of wearing), it mostly washes off. Which is a big bummer. I also can’t sleep on anything but dark sheets or towel off on anything but a dark brown towel without ruining them all. I won’t be buying this again because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: natural tan that doesn't wash off after first shower
customer_reviews.text: I've used several self tanners- lotions, spray tans, drug store, high end etc and this has been my best experience yet. other tanning solutions look dark initially but you see the results wash down the drain after the first shower. I also found the smell to be pretty mild in comparison to other solutions. DHA will always have some smell, but this one is milder than most others. I used to love Tarte, but their recipe seems to have changed and the tan doesn't last as long as the Skinerals Californium solution. This is a second purchase for me and I'm sure not my last!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: After years of searching..best sunless bronzer!!!
customer_reviews.text: My legs are very white (like mayonnaise white, according to my daughter). I used an application mitt, and followed the directions to the letter. In the beginning, I was thinking it was a waste of money, as I did not see any color change. Then as if were magic, I woke up with the most beautiful bronze legs. The color is so authentic. Not orange, not splotchy. I "tanned" on Saturday, and by Tuesday my legs were still bronze. I finally found my sunless tanner holy grail!
customer_reviews.author: KVC

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never before used a self tanner. So I was really nervous. I'm not sure if I'm just being biased but I think I did really good. You could see right away where you needed to add more. Or maybe places where you needed to wipe some off. It dried pretty quick and had NO SCENT at all! I was worried it would STINK and I would need a vent on. But no vent. And also no mess. Right on the mit and right on my skin. Easy to do and I love the color!!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tan, Smell is strong.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tanner. I’ve tried a lot of different ones and this has to be my favorite. I’m pretty pale and had issues with other tanners making me too dark/orange. This one is the perfect color. The bottle probably lasts me a month. I apply it every weekend before I go out and it almost lasts me the entire week. *update* Smell is getting to be unbearable. I’m not sure if I’m just getting sick of it or maybe the formula changed but it’s intense.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Could be better..
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this product based on the great reviews it had but I am disappointed in the end result. The application process was cake with the mitt I ordered to go with the self tanner. I saw immediate results and the next morning I looked like a tan goddess! But after I took a shower as it directs after 8-12 hours almost all of the color washed off! I know it says on the bottle that a lot of color will wash off but it didn’t say ALL of the color will wash off. The only remaining color is by my ankles, knees, hands, and elbows. I wanted to love this but I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Super tanning solution with no sun damage.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It goes on evenly and there are no streaks when using a mitt. The color looks very natural and it's so easy and fast to apply. I have re-ordered several times over the past couple of years and I have not been let down. There is a faint odor of the tanning solution hours after applying, but after a shower that's gone and the tan looks so natural it tricks people. This is coming from a mostly Irish person. I have tried countless other products and this is by far my favorite. I've even sent it to my sister and she loves it too. I highly recommend it and hope it stays available.
customer_reviews.author: Juell G. Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: NATURAL med.-dark tan with not even a hint of orange! Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for the best and this may be it! It comes out in a foam and it’s so easy to apply. I use a mitt for more even coverage. This has made me TAN! Not orange! Not even a hint of it! It’s very light so it doesn’t feel greasy or heavy. I have gotten so many compliments on how natural my tan looks. I know there are a lot of choices out there & I have tried a few but I would highly recommend this! I love how natural it looks and especially love the natural ingredients of this product. I will absolutely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: not goopy,  true tan color, perfect for face , not sticky, instant color
customer_reviews.text: Great for face if you are prone to acne and have sensitive skin. The natural paraben free is an added plus. It's a foam. Shake before using and for better spreading I mix it w/ a small bit of facial moisturizer. It's light , clean + fresh and you wont get irritation or acne. I pray it never is discontinued. Probably wouldn't use for whole body - save for more delicate skin . No orangey color . Quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lumsden

customer_reviews.title: No my favorite, but it's okay.
customer_reviews.text: I find the foam ones more difficult to apply and are more streaky and that was my issue with this product. Even when I bought everything for application, I was still disappointed. I use self-tanner often and am good at applying, but this one just wasn't easy enough to apply and looked streaky.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: So Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I usually pay ab out $80 for a spray tan & I still have not found a place that I am really happy with. So I thought after seeing all the great reviews I would try this self tanner, worried that I would not do a good job, I did a trial before my 3 day event. OMG this tanner is amazing, I look so golden & not orange or yellow, I love it! make sure you buy the mit set, I think that is key to no streaks
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Keeps an even color over plenty of days!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tanner! I decided to try a more natural self tanner, and I’m glad I did. I put it on 5 days ago and I’m still tanned! I never write reviews but I felt like I needed to, cause this stuff is goooood. Not only am I still tanned, I’m NOT splotchy. So even though it’s probably coming off some, you can’t tell because it’s still so even. I have a larger chest area, and usually self tanner will come off under my boobs because they’re rubbing on that skin so much. But for some reason that doesn’t happen with this stuff. Woohoo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tanning foam.
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth with a mitt. Wouldn’t suggest using your hands. Even color. Develops nicely and well. Be sure to exfoliate well before. Doesn’t streak. Will wear off unevenly if bathing if you haven’t exfoliated well ahead of time. Watch hairline especially if you’re a blonde. Can go on the face.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna A. Safranek

customer_reviews.title: My favorite product!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best sunless tanning product I’ve ever tried! I work a very busy schedule and don’t get to be outside as much as I would like. This product gives me a very natural and easy tan that looks amazing. Easy application , great smell- have had no problems with staining clothes or smearing. Will continue to keep re-ordering ! (One bottle lasted a long time so definitely get moneys worth)
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: amazing, natural looking tan...INSTANTLY!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the bomb! I've tried the more expensive self tanner mousse and this by far hands down is so much better...smells better, applies very easy and the color pay off from just one application is incredible! I bought the mitt separately and it is a MUST for even application. highly recommend Skinerals Self Tanner and will be re-purchasing it throughout the summer!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent self tanner
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage and easy to apply. I love the mouse verses other brands which are watery and create a huge mess. I wish I would of ordered the darker shade. The California is more for a porcelain/ fair skinned person. It does become darker hours later. Can’t speak for how long it will last (just applied today). However, I am a realist and know there is no self tanner that last over 4 -5 days. No product last 7 days... maybe if you don’t bath/shower.
customer_reviews.author: K lee

customer_reviews.title: Streaky and weird color
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this 4 times and no matter how carefully I make sure to rub it all in evenly it’s always streaky. The color is also a little off, it has a slight pink tone and doesn’t look natural.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Tried sooo many, this one wins!
customer_reviews.text: After fake bake went up in cost I started trying different ones. Not only was this the best one but it surpassed the results of fake bake. Just make sure to exfoliate and don’t over do it. It’s instantly darker but it also develops more over the night. (I typically use it in the evening).
customer_reviews.author: Eric W. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like that the ingredients are natural. Smells like brown sugar. Gives a good bronze. Doesn’t last as well as st tropes but it’s not orange like at tropes. It’s easy to use and you can see where you are applying. Don’t need to leave on as long as says on bottle
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: For Beginners OR experienced. Must have.
customer_reviews.text: I used to spend 2x this price for st. Tropez and I have never gone back since. They are practically the same- if not, this one is better. Smells like sweet syrup and not chemically. I’ve been self tanning consistently (applying every few days) for about two years. This is the best one out there and it’s so cheap!!?! Leaves you skin looking healthy, moisturized, and glowy. Most people who have issues with this product are probably seeing problems because of they way they apply- not because the quality of this bronzer.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Smith

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried (like most) what feels like almost every tanner. This tanner is by far the best! When first applied I will admit I am not a huge fan of the smell or for that fact that it looks like you are wearing a bad fake tan. HOWEVER! after waiting 8-12 hours and then showering you are left with a beautiful bronze sun tan, just like stated on the bottle. I also recommend buying the tan extender. I use it after the shower and every other day before tanning again to keep a nice bronze look. The tan extender also smells wicked good. All together this product is amazing and long lasting!! so stop searching and buy!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: HOLY GRAIL
customer_reviews.text: HOLY GRAIL OF SELF TANNER this stuff is the bomb. I spread it with a tanning mit and it drys quickly! Don’t go overboard! In the morning you wake up glowing!!! Also small tip-lotion up!!! From the morning you wake up lotion your entire body over the tanner! This stuff will last longer if you do that
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: I have used so many self tanners. Think I found this one from tik tok. I don’t remember. But omg I’m obsessed. First off, NO SMELL! None. Nothing! It goes on great, no splotches. I do use a mitt! I even went to the pool the day after I put it on, and it didn’t come off!! I’m going to buy this forever
customer_reviews.author: KKHOLIDAY

product_meta.title: Skinerals Californium Self Tanner Mousse - Sunless Tanning Lotion with Organic and Natural Ingredients for Fake Tan, 8 Oz Bottle
feature_bullets: NATURAL LOOKING TAN - This green-based solution counteracts the fake orange tan look that can often be an issue with other self tanners. Apply Californium at night and shower in the morning to achieve a natural, gorgeous glow without streaks or blotches.

SAFE SUNLESS TAN - Californium is perfect for lighter skin tones, and is the best way to get a healthy, natural glow for up to 7 days without exposing your skin to harmful UV rays that can cause premature wrinkles and skin cancer. Californium contains as many natural and organic ingredients as possible for the safest tan possible.

FACE AND BODY APPLICATION - This self-tanner mousse is non-greasy, light, quick to dry, and has a soft, pleasant smell. There is no need to purchase a second product for your face as this product doesn't cause acne and can be applied under makeup.

PURE NATURAL BLENDS - Our bronzers contain antioxidants such as acai berry and fig extracts to help even out skin tone and reduce the appearance of blemishes and keep the skin looking youthful. This is a USA made cruelty-free, sulfate-free, paraben-free, aerosol-free, and vegan skincare solution.

SKINERALS NATURAL SKIN SOLUTIONS - Skinerals is dedicated to helping you get back the beauty you were born with through our full skin and hair care line. We use hundreds of different minerals and earth elements to promote healthy cell development, providing relief from many skin and hair conditions.
